sapote的意思、解释 n.  1. 美洲几种热带树或其果实sapote的用法例句 1. black sapote 黑肉柿 2. sapote 美洲几种热带树或其果实 3. sapote gum 人心果胶.

means.word_mean: 1. tropical American tree having wood like mahogany and sweet edible egg-shaped fruit; in some classifications placed in the genus Calocarpum
2. brown oval fruit flesh makes excellent sherbet
